title: 3 bd/ 3.5 br townhouse for rent immendiately
description:
Available for rent immediately. Beautifully furnished, modern 3 bed, 3 and a half bath home, with attached garage, for rent in Graduate Neighborhood!
6-month lease rent: $4300
12-month lease rent: $4100
Located on a quiet block in Graduate Hospital, this 7 year old luxury townhome features 1-car garage parking, a full skyline view from two roof decks, and recessed lights throughout. Enter into the light filled foyer, with hardwood oak flooring that continues throughout the home. In addition to garage access, the first level features a spacious den/office, a powder room, and a sliding glass door which leads to the back patio. Take the open staircase, with beautiful wrought iron bannisters, up to the main floor where the oversized gourmet kitchen is adorned with ample cabinetry, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and wine refrigerator. The main living area, with ample natural light from oversized south facing windows, is the perfect space for entertaining and relaxing. On the third level, you'll find the primary suite and second bedroom, both of which have spacious closets and en-suite baths. The primary suite bathroom features a double vanity, beautifully tiled shower, and a linen closet. The second bedroom with en-suite has a stall shower making it perfect for guests. Take the stairs up to the top level and exit onto your dueling roof decks with breathtaking Center City and stadium views both of which are perfect for entertaining and watching the sunset. The full finished basement features hardwood floors, a third bedroom, full bath with tub shower, and an additional bonus room which is perfect for a playroom or additional home office. This home is truly in the perfect location for anyone looking to be within close proximity to everything that Graduate Hospital has to offer!
Open House: Saturday Aug 6, 12 noon - 4pm
Tenant pays for utilities - electric, water, security and wifi
No smoking allowed. Up to small pets permitted.
Renter insurance required.
6-month lease possible at the suggested price.

description:
2017 home in very good condition located in Philadelphia Ridge, one of the most desired locations in Philadelphia.
The neighborhood is zoned for highly rated schools (Central Park Elementary School, Philadelphia High School) and just a few minutes off of Walton Blvd. The neighborhood features a walking trail, gated community pool, large playground, kids play area and a park-like common area surrounding the lake.

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $590.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

title: Millersville Student/College Student Housing
description:
Small basement apartment with private access and NO kitchen for rent at secluded wooded property.
This apartment is located in the basement of our home which is closed off from our living area. It has its own exterior entrance and has two rooms and a bathroom. There is no kitchen, but previous tenants have used a dorm refrigerator, hot plate and or microwave for meals. We have rented to Millersville students in the past and it has worked out well. We would prefer a student but are open to other options.  Absolutely no smoking or drug use is permitted. This space is for one person and one person only, please do not send an email telling us how you and your child or partner could make it work we will rent to one person only.  The apartment is located below our living room so there is normal household noise.
The property is located approximately 2 miles from the Millersville campus. We are then located back a half mile stone driveway in the woods.
Rent is $500 monthly and a $500 security deposit is required prior to move-in. All utilities are paid for and Wi-Fi is included also.
Applicants should send an email giving their background and housing interest.  Applicants must provide references and proof of income. We have two children and are extremely picky with who we would allow at the property. If you have a questionable background or lifestyle please do not apply.

title: BEAUTIFUL 3-story, 3 bedroom, 2 full bathrooms in the the heart of Fishtown!
description:
Available September 2022!
This beautiful three-story home is located in the heart of Fishtown, which Forbes Magazine described as one of the best neighborhoods to live in the U.S.!
The home has a recently remodeled kitchen with a ton of natural lighting, stainless steel appliances, a built in dishwasher and a wrap around counter for eating, working or hanging out.
There is hard wood flooring throughout the home with a smart Nest thermostat which operates the gas heat and electric central air conditioning. Water is included in your rent. There is full semi-finished basement for storage and laundry.
The patio is also in the process of an update, with a new Moroccan style, tiled wall being built. Included are older and recent pictures of the yard to give you a sense of the space.
There are a total of three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The second floor has one large bedroom and one smaller bedroom, as well as a full bathroom.  The third floor master bedroom runs the entire length of the house and also has it's own newly renovated full bathroom with a large soaking bathtub.
This listing is furnished, but if you prefer unfurnished, let us know!
Parking:
There's street parking available with no time limit and no permit required.
We are walking distance to the Market-Frankford line, which will quickly take you to Center City, University City, Old City, South Philly, and more ($2.25 token fee). Lyft and Uber are always nearby and typically arrive in ~3 minutes. We are also close to I 95 as well.
Popular nearby:
Fishtown is one of the best neighborhoods in Philly! We are walking distance to some of the greatest cafes, bars and restaurants in both Fishtown and Northern Liberties:
Frankford Hall Beer Garden
Suraya Restaurant

title: Share big house in beautiful wooded area w/professionals & PUpost-docs
description:
Unique house share in beautiful area of Princeton: Large house shared by mid-20s to mid-30s academics and professionals, all of whom are vaccinated and follow CDC guidelines for staying safe. Backyard trail through 5+ private acres of woods and wildlife, walkable/bikable to PU, Bristol-Meyers Squibb and Educational Testing Service.
Avail Aug. 15 is a furnished (or unfurnished, if preferred) 17' x 12' room w/additional sleeping nook that fits a queen size bed and a 7'x7' walk-in closet with a window and built-ins, for $1175/month, plus the $200/month common fee -- which covers utilities, weekly maid service (including bedroom if desired), grounds care, house supplies (incl laundry and dish detergent, paper products, cooking and cleaning supplies, etc), fastest wifi and media, wine and snack subscriptions detailed below -- a total of $1175/month.
New housemates are chosen by consensus of existing housemates after a 15-minute interview, ensuring a warm, compatible environment with good boundaries. We will be interviewing on Tuesday evening, Aug. 9. Housemates tend to be attracted to the house by the privacy, easy sense of community, carefully selected housemates, and the convenience of having weekly housekeeping service, fastest wifi, house supplies (paper towels, toilet paper, cleaning and cleaning supplies), groundskeeping and all utilities taken care of in the common fee. Also included in the common fee are monthly wine and artisanal snack subscriptions, and subscriptions to YouTube TV, Netflix, Disney +, HBOMax, etc.
The house has an unusual floor plan that divides bedrooms into four separate "wings," affording greater privacy than in a typical house. The kitchen is great, with a separate large cabinet for each housemate plus common plates, glasses, utensils, pro-grade pots and pans, etc. It has two refrigerators, stainless steel appliances (gas stove), oak floors. The house has three full baths, each shared by two.
Flexible lease term, though we typically sign leases through Aug of the following year (in accord w/ the academic schedule), with the option of leaving early or renewing with 60 days notice. If you have your own bed, ours can be put into storage here. Washer/dryer. Please, no cats or couples. 2.8 miles to campus, w/well-maintained walkway and sidewalk the full way. Easily walkable or bikable to the campuses of Princeton University, Bristol-Meyers Squibb and ETS.
